document_data.name: Skortchclaw tribe
document_data.symbol: A clawed hand surrounded by flame.
document_data.mainbody: '''Skortchclaw''' was a large tribe of [[orc]]s located in the [[Spine of the World]].
document_data.Activities: In [[1370 DR]], the clan leader, King [[Ugra Ngarl]], was forcing [[goblin]] slaves to mine [[mithral]] from beneath [[Fortress Eyegad]]. Large quantities of the metal were being sold to a buyer in the [[High Forest]].
document_data.History: In [[1372 DR]], [[Pharaun Mizzrym]] and [[Ryld Argith]] discovered the Skortchclaw symbol carved into a wall in the [[Braeryn]] district of the [[drow]] city of [[Menzoberranzan]]. That indicated isolated members of the Skortchclaw tribe in Menzoberranzan were involved in an uprising led by the [[alhoon]] [[Syrzan]] against the priestesses of the city.
